meanings.definition: The activities or events associated with attending a play or theater performance.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the playgoings at the theater last night.
meanings.sent2: The playgoings at the school play were exciting.
meanings.sent3: The playgoings at the theater made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for playgoings was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The colorful playgoings on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of individuals involved in playing or engaging in recreational activities.
meanings.sent1: The children's playgoings in the park were full of laughter.
meanings.sent2: His playgoings during recess were always energetic.
meanings.sent3: Their playgoings in the backyard were a joy to watch.
meanings.sent4: The playgoings of the team showed great teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The playgoings of the puppies in the yard were adorable.
